title: Process Monthly Rent Payment
description: A property manager processes a tenant's monthly rent payment and handles a late fee.

tasks.description: Receive a rent payment after the grace period has ended.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies that the payment is late.

tasks.description: Automatically calculate and apply the late fee as specified in the lease agreement.
tasks.expected_outcome: The correct late fee is added to the tenant's ledger.

tasks.description: Record the rent payment and the late fee payment in the tenant's ledger.
tasks.expected_outcome: The tenant's balance is correctly updated to zero.
